name: Ellumi the Fire Sprite
description:
Help Ellumi explore the land to discover why all the other Fire Sprites in the volcano have vanished.

(6/3/2022) This was a project for my  Game Development class. I worked on it with [Kenneth Harper], and they were great to work with.

Controls:

A/D - Walk left/right
Space - Jump
LMB - Shoot fire (or, make a request after talking. See below)
E - Talk

After talking to the Claire the Air Sprite in the Mountains, you can ask her to move to a specific spot (by clicking with LMB where you would like her to move) or to create a wind zone across a line (by clicking with LMB at the start and end points).

Here were some pages I wrote detailing certain parts of the game I had worked on, as a "deep dive" for the class:

Character behaviour: https://airtoum.carrd.co/#ellumi1
AI Pathfinding: https://airtoum.carrd.co/#ellumi2

Major systems that Kenneth worked on included

Substance interactions (fire-wood, wind zone, etc.)
Game art
Animations

Additionally, we had some help with [Matthew Hammans] for the dialogue system.
